Text: Re Come Visit Mea message dated AM Pacific Daylight Time writes Us girls have talked about visiting you but just couldnt agree on a date Joe and I just got back from a vacation in Banff Canada with Jackie and Dannie We had a wonderful time We did some major hiking there It was so relaxing We had no tv or phone for a week Were going to Montana over Labor Day weekend for Joes nieces wedding Cant believe Joe and I are taking vacatins this year Regarding logistically getting to your ranch is it possible to fly into Colorado Springs or do we need to fly into Denver We would love to come visit you if we can agree on a date because I love to hike You could come into Colorado Springsbut it would add hours to hours to your commute There used to be a price advantage but I dont think there is anymore unless youve checked recently The cabin is about hours northwest of DIA Its great hiking Lets find a time How are Jackie and Dan Nancy
